body_html:
I almost never advertise my tutorials, but I came across this thread and saw it was still active, so you might like to know about my recent tutorial on hyper-parameter optimization in TensorFlow using Keras and scikit-optimize which has various forms of Bayesian optimization methods including Gaussian Processes and Random Forests:

https://github.com/Hvass-Labs/TensorFlow-Tutorials/blob/master/19_Hyper-Parameters.ipynb

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oaxf3rk0KGM

body:
I almost never advertise my tutorials, but I came across this thread and saw it was still active, so you might like to know about my recent tutorial on hyper-parameter optimization in TensorFlow using Keras and scikit-optimize which has various forms of Bayesian optimization methods including Gaussian Processes and Random Forests:

https://github.com/Hvass-Labs/TensorFlow-Tutorials/blob/master/19_Hyper-Parameters.ipynb
